questions.question_text: Jamo thāļ Jīvan jāu vārī, dhovu kar charan karo tyārī... Beso melyā ____________ dhāļī,
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Bhūmānand Swāmī is 'Beso melyā bājothiyā dhāļī'.

questions.question_text: Karī kāthā ghaunī poļī, Melī ghrut sākarmā boļī; Kādhyo ras ____________ ghoļī... jamo thāļ 2
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Bhūmānand Swāmī is 'Kādhyo ras kerīno ghoļī'.

questions.question_text: Galyā sātā ghebar fülvadī, Dūdhpāk mālpūā kadhī; Pūrī pochĩ thaï chhe ____________ chadhī... jamo thāļ 3
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Bhūmānand Swāmī is 'Pūrī pochĩ thaï chhe ghīmā chadhī'.

questions.question_text: Athāņā shāk sundar bhājī, Lāvī chhu tarat karī tāji; Dahī bhāt ____________ chhe jhājhi... jamo thāļ 4
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Bhūmānand Swāmī is 'Dahī bhāt sākar chhe jhājhi'.

questions.question_text: Chaļu karo lāvu jaļjhārī, Elāychī laving sopārī, Pānbīdī ____________ sārī... jamo thāļ 5
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Bhūmānand Swāmī is 'Pānbīdī banāvī sārī'.

questions.question_text: Mukhvās mangamtā laīne, Prasādīno thāļ mune daine, Bhumānand kahe ____________ thaïne... jamo thāļ 6
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Bhūmānand Swāmī is 'Bhumānand kahe rājī thaïne'.

questions.question_text: Māre gher āvjo Chhogalādhārī; Lādu jalebī ne sev suvāļī, Hu to bhāve karī lāvī chhu ____________...
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Jayarãm Brahmachãri is 'Hu to bhāve karī lāvī chhu ghari'.

questions.question_text: Sūran pūran ne bhājī kārelā, Pāpad vadi vaghārī; Vantāk vāloļnā shāk karyā, Me to ____________ chhamkārī... māre 1
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Jayarãm Brahmachãri is 'Me to choļāfaļī chhamkārī'.

questions.question_text: Kāju kamodnā bhāt karyā, Me to dāļ karī bahu sārī; Limbu kākdīnā lejo athāņā, Kadhī karī chhe ____________... māre 2
questions.explanation: The lyric from 'Thāl' by Jayarãm Brahmachãri is 'Kadhī karī chhe Kāthiyāvādī'.
The line from the Prarthana is 'Shrimat-sadguņa shālinam chidachidi vyāptam cha divyākrutim'.
